title: WTB: PSA T207 Hooper & Carey, CJ Honus, DeLong Gehrig
author: scotgreb

posts.post_title: WTB: PSA T207 Hooper & Carey, CJ Honus, DeLong Gehrig
posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA 1,2,3 or 4 examples of:

T207 Harry Hooper
T207 Max Carey
1914 or 15 Honus Wagner
1933 DeLong Gehrig

If you prefer to trade, I have plenty available in my ebay store (id = scotgreb)

Please email or PM if you have one available - thanks.
